unnormalised: The rooftop solar subsidy program is crucial for India's 2030 renewable energy goals. Timely disbursement of funds is essential; delays like those experienced in the UP grid connection project, initiated on 26/01/2022, hinder progress. Streamlining the application process and ensuring transparency, as advised by TERI on 10/10/2023 at 14:00 hrs, will encourage wider adoption. Subsidies make solar accessible to middle-class families in cities like Chennai. Revisiting the subsidy amounts post-Diwali, maybe around 15/11/2024, aligned with current module prices (Rs. 40/Watt), is advisable.
normalised: The rooftop solar subsidy program is crucial for India's two thousand thirty renewable energy goals. Timely disbursement of funds is essential; delays like those experienced in the U P grid connection project, initiated on twenty sixth January two thousand twenty two, hinder progress. Streamlining the application process and ensuring transparency, as advised by T E R I on tenth October two thousand twenty three at two P M, will encourage wider adoption. Subsidies make solar accessible to middle-class families in cities like Chennai. Revisiting the subsidy amounts post-Diwali, maybe around fifteenth November two thousand twenty four, aligned with current module prices (rupees forty per Watt), is advisable.
